begSample.Description: the beginning sample of the trial since the start of the recording

endSample.Description: the last sample of the trial since the start of the recording

SetSize.Description: the number of letters shown to the participant during the encoding period of the verbal working memory task

ProbeLetter.Description: the letter shown to the participant during the retrieval period of the verbal working memory task

Match.Description: IN if the probe letter was part of the set of the letters shown during encoding or OUT otherwise

Correct.Description: the field indicates whether the response of the participant was correct or not

ResponseTime.Description: the response time of the participant since the probe letter appeared

Artifact.Description: boolean flag indicating if a trial has artifacts
